Articles.Content: Make it to the Mun using only solid fuel! Extra points if you go somewhere else cool:D. Only stock parts, info mods + beauty mods allowed.

Alt f12 is allowed???!!!

OH YE, these sepetrons will be AMAZING to launch a capsule into the Mun with infini fuel.

Make it to the Mun using only solid fuel! Extra points if you go somewhere else cool:D. Only stock parts, info mods + beauty mods allowed.

Hi !

This challenge looks fun but your challenge entry lacks (at least a capsule) description :

- Precise rule. For exemple, manned/unmanned, multiple rockets/one rocket, safe return to Kerbin/one way trip,...

- Points calculations. What do you mean by "Extra points" ?

- Give your exemple, it shows the feasibility of the challenge

- Mods suggestions or restrictions

- Leaderboard

Make it to the Mun using only solid fuel! Extra points if you go somewhere else cool:D. Only stock parts, info mods + beauty mods allowed.
